name: Jaddati
description:
Jaddati - Capstone Project for Game Design and Development 5: Capstone Project MSU Coursera Couse. 

Done By: Wejdan Al-Ahmadi 

Game Features: 

  1. 2D side-scrolling platformer. 
  2. 3 attacks (jump on enemies heads, throw cookie projectiles, hit with melee cane attack)
  3. 4 Different Unique enemies (Moving bat, Orc, Orc Boss, Ghost)
  4. Different level design and puzzles to find keys. 
  5. Completely new art for UI and characters and environment. 
  6. New sound effects and music. 
  7. Key spawn after boss is killed. 

Resources: 

MSU, Unity asset Store, Epidemic Sound, GameDevMarket.
